sentence.Network_en: Her daringly low-cut dress scandalised audiences.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那袭大胆的低胸裙使观众大为震惊。

sentence.Network_en: "Cheers," he said and winked daringly at her.
sentence.Network_cn: “干杯，”他边说边大胆地向她使眼色。

sentence.Network_en: Don't yield to misfortune. You should challenge it more daringly and vigorously.
sentence.Network_cn: 莫向不幸屈服, 应该更大胆、更积极地向不幸挑战.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... daring 大胆的 daringly 大胆地 dariole 小圈饼.
近似字词-新浪字典 ... daring 勇敢,胆量 daringly 大胆地;毅然地 daringness 胆大;勇敢;蛮横.
daringly , he set out on a camping trip in East Africa ., 他出发去了东非野营旅行 , 真是鲁莽.

list.abs: inflict cruelly 残忍地处罚inflict daringly 大胆地处罚inflict deliberately 有意地处罚
omit casually 漫不经心地删掉omit daringly 大胆地删掉omit deliberately 故意删掉
today , eating at a nice restaurant and feeling curious , I daringly ask for the surprise' Maiden's Dreams' desert .今天，在一家挺不错的餐馆吃饭时，我出于好奇，就大胆地点了一个“少女之梦”的甜点。
...dress conservatively穿着保守dress daringly穿着大胆dress decently穿得得体.

entry.tran: 大胆的;敢于冒险的;勇于创新的
entry.def: People who are daring are willing to do or say things which are new or which might shock or anger other people.

example.ex: Bergit was probably more daring than I was...
example.tran: 伯吉特可能比我更敢于冒险。

example.ex: He realized this to be a very daring thing to ask.
example.tran: 他意识到这是一个非常大胆的问题。

entry.def: A daring person is willing to do things that might be dangerous.

example.tran: 英勇无畏的查利·皮尔斯

example.ex: His daring rescue saved the lives of the youngsters.
example.tran: 他的大胆营救保住了那些年轻人的性命。

entry.def: Daring is the courage to do things which might be dangerous or which might shock or anger other people.

example.ex: His daring may have cost him his life.
example.tran: 他的冒险可能让他断送了性命。

sentences.sentence: "daringly, he set out on a camping trip in East Africa"

auth_sentence.content: His big dream was a nuclear-free world, which he pursued daringly but peacefully.

auth_sentence.content: He liked to compare the daringly cantilevered balconies to trays on a waiter's fingers.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He liked to compare the daringly cantilevered balconies to trays on a waiter's fingers.

auth_sentence.content: But can they convincingly handle The Rite, with its batty accelarations and daringly skewed rhythmic idiosyncracies?
